name: WOEBLOOM
description:
A roguelike emphasizing use of equipable items and actions.

Interact with the altar in the hub to equip items.


Move- arrow keys

Z- scroll items

X- use item

1,2,3,4 - Assign item in inventory

* this version of the game is pretty unfinished and unpolished but it's what we managed to implement within the timeframe. We intend to update the game in the coming days after the jam to bring it into a presentable state.
